docs.snippet: A federal judge on Monday set witness disclosure deadlines in court proceedings for a man accused of plotting to attack the U.S. Capitol in support of Islamic State group extremists....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Monday set witness disclosure deadlines in court proceedings for a man accused of plotting to attack the U.S. Capitol in support of Islamic State group extremists.

headline.main: Judge Sets New Deadlines in US Capitol Terror Plot Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Sets New Deadlines in US Capitol Terror Plot Case

docs.snippet: The embattled archbishop of St. Paul and Minneapolis and his deputy resigned Monday after years of pressure, an indication Pope Francis is making good on his promise that no one is above the law when it comes to covering up for clergy who sexually...
docs.lead_paragraph: The embattled archbishop of St. Paul and Minneapolis and his deputy resigned Monday after years of pressure, an indication Pope Francis is making good on his promise that no one is above the law when it comes to covering up for clergy who sexually abuse children.

headline.main: US Archbishop Quits After Archdiocese Charged With Cover-Up
headline.print_headline: US Archbishop Quits After Archdiocese Charged With Cover-Up

docs.lead_paragraph: Despite the proliferation of investment in the industry, many filmmakers in their 20s and 30s say it is difficult to get financial support.

headline.main: In Chinese Cinema, Survival of Fittest
headline.print_headline: In Chinese Cinema, Survival of Fittest

docs.snippet: Those between 65 and 74, supported by Social Security, pensions and investments, have fared better than most other groups outside the superrich....
docs.lead_paragraph: Those between 65 and 74, supported by Social Security, pensions and investments, have fared better than most other groups outside the superrich.
docs.abstract: Analysis reveals that American seniors made significant gains during and after the recession, profiting from Social Security, pensions, investments and income from deferred retirement; while there are many individual exceptions, those between ages of 65 and 74 fared better than much of middle class, and are positioned to enjoy more successful old age than both older and younger generations (Series: A Shifting Middle).

headline.print_headline: U.S. Seniors Prosper, Finding ‘Sweet Spot’ in Middle Class

byline.original: By DIONNE SEARCEY and ROBERT GEBELOFF
